tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    from_address VARCHAR(255),
    to_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_activity (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    node_id UUID,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    activity_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address TEXT,
    receiver_address TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE network_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender_ip TEXT,
    receiver_ip TEXT,
    action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_type VARCHAR,
  amount DECIMAL,
  sender_address VARCHAR,
  receiver_address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE blocks (
  block_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  block_hash VARCHAR,
  transactions_count INT,
  block_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_stats (
  stat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  total_transactions_count INT,
  total_blocks_count INT,
  network_hash_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_status (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    update_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    source_ip VARCHAR(50),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT,
    preference_key VARCHAR(50),
    preference_value TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, preference_key),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_accounts(user_id)
);
